scripts.install:backend: cd backend && python -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install --upgrade pip setuptools wheel && pip install -r requirements/dev.txt
scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python run.py
scripts.dev: npm run prisma && concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.prisma:prepare:frontend: rm -f frontend/prisma/schema.prisma && cat frontend/prisma/generator.prisma shared/prisma/schema.base.prisma > frontend/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.prisma:prepare:backend: rm -f backend/prisma/schema.prisma && cat backend/prisma/generator.prisma shared/prisma/schema.base.prisma > backend/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.prisma:sync: npm run prisma:prepare:backend && cd backend && prisma migrate dev
scripts.prisma: npm run prisma:prepare && npm run prisma:generate
